variables.name: FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID
variables.description: Project ID from your Firebase service account JSON file

variables.name: STRIPE_SECRET_KEY
variables.description: Stripe secret key (if you have Stripe account)

variables.name: STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY
variables.description: Stripe publishable key (if you have Stripe account)

variables.name: STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET
variables.description: Stripe webhook secret (if you have Stripe account)

variables.name: GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY
variables.description: Google Maps API key (if you have Google Cloud account)

variables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
variables.description: OpenAI API key (if you have OpenAI account)

notes.firebase: Abre tu archivo JSON y copia el valor de 'project_id'
notes.stripe: Opcional - solo si tienes cuenta de Stripe
notes.google_maps: Opcional - solo si necesitas Google Maps
